She insisted on getting police help despite resistance. We went to the precinct to demand protection. The police captain offered little help. My mother refused to move due to lack of funds. She asked for a police escort home to make a statement. We returned in a police patrol, drawing attention. My mother addressed the neighbors about our situation. The neighbors eventually became kind after the incident.
